item.description:
***Note - Meetup automatically put this in the calendar for December 3. It is not Dec 3 - but rather, Dec 10.***

Networking happy hour - 6-8pm. Looking to make this a monthly thing on 2nd Wednesday of each month. Then we will work to add in some speakers and other events on top of that, but having a consistent event is key. Please RSVP so we can give them an idea of how many are coming.

Time: 6pm-8pm
Date: Wednesday, December 10
Place: 116 Crown, downtown New Haven

Please RSVP!

- David
item.name: GNH Design and Marketing December Meetup
